hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Umar that he had vowed during the days of Ignorance to spend one night in I’tikaf. He asked the Prophet (ﷺ) about it, so he commanded him to spend it in I’tikaf

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي اعْتِكَافِ يَوْمٍ أَوْ لَيْلَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: Observing I`tikaf for one day or one night
